game.title: The Quest for the Lost Key
game.objective: Complete all tasks to find and unlock the secret door
game.description: A thrilling adventure awaits in hidden chambers, puzzles, and treasures. Follow the guidance of Master Wizard:

task.description: Uncover the entrance in the library and proceed.
In the first chamber, locate the pedestal to obtain the scroll.
Use the scroll to decode the riddle in the library.
Discover the hidden stash in the secret chamber and use the key found there.
